title: 服务器自从装lwc之后只要是用sqlite数据库的插件就全炸了
author: luenlin
txt_content:
[18:32:51] [Server thread/INFO]: [EasyKits] Enabling EasyKits v1.4.7
[18:32:51] [Server thread/INFO]: [EasyKits] Vault found! Economy support enabled!
[18:32:51] [Server thread/WARN]: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\测试端\plugins\LWC\lib\native\Windows\amd64\sqlitejdbc.dll: %1 不是有效的 Win32 应用程序。
[18:32:51] [Server thread/WARN]: [EasyKits] Creating database!
像是简单礼包 或者快捷商店都用不了
顺便求lwc用MySQL的正确配置文件

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
这种情况我以前遇到过
是LWC下载sqlite的相关dll库，却被墙了，导致整个服务端无法使用sqlite
解决办法：
1、翻墙
2、去服务端板块下载有LWC的服务端，将DLL复制过去

mysql配置：

database

adapter: (default: sqlite) Which database type you want to use.
path: (default: plugins/LWC/lwc.db) Path to that database.
host: (default: localhost) The address of the host the database is on.
database: (default: lwc) The name of the database.
username: (default: '') The username LWC uses to connect to the database.
password: (default: '') The password of the username above.
prefix: (default: lwc_)复制代码
都是一些mysql的名词，如果有哪些不懂回复我
